scenarios.title: Advanced Enterprise Campus Network Design - Medium Enterprise
scenarios.requirement: Design network for 5000-user campus with high availability, security segmentation, and future growth capacity.
scenarios.considerations: Three-tier architecture, redundant links, VLAN segmentation, QoS implementation, wireless integration, security policies.
scenarios.solution: Implement hierarchical design with redundant core, distribution layer aggregation, access layer PoE switches, controller-based wireless.
scenarios.expert_notes: Design for 3-5 year growth projections, not just current needs.
scenarios.lessons_learned: Standardization and simplicity often outweigh feature richness in operational environments.

scenarios.solution: Implement hierarchical design with redundant core, distribution layer aggregation, access layer PoE switches, controller-based wireless.
scenarios.expert_notes: Implement redundancy at critical points to eliminate single points of failure.

scenarios.title: Advanced Data Center Network Architecture - Service Provider
scenarios.requirement: Design modern data center network supporting virtualization, container orchestration, and hybrid cloud connectivity.
scenarios.considerations: Leaf-spine topology, overlay networks, container networking, load balancing, disaster recovery, automation.
scenarios.solution: Implement CLOS fabric with VXLAN overlays, integrate with orchestration platforms, automate provisioning, implement micro-segmentation.
scenarios.expert_notes: Design for 3-5 year growth projections, not just current needs.
scenarios.lessons_learned: Standardization and simplicity often outweigh feature richness in operational environments.

scenarios.title: Intermediate WAN Optimization and SD-WAN Migration - Small Enterprise
scenarios.requirement: Modernize WAN infrastructure for 50 branch offices with improved performance, reduced costs, and centralized management.
scenarios.considerations: Bandwidth optimization, application performance, security, management complexity, cost reduction, failover capabilities.
scenarios.solution: Deploy SD-WAN solution with centralized orchestration, implement application-aware routing, integrate security functions.
scenarios.expert_notes: Design for 3-5 year growth projections, not just current needs.
scenarios.lessons_learned: Standardization and simplicity often outweigh feature richness in operational environments.
